column4: This is braindead.  Re-installed Firefox from scratch and its still broken.  Anybody with experience on Firefox crashes?
any particular pattern to when it hangs?
what graphics driver are you using?
here, what graphics card are you using?
Its pasted.  Where do I send it to?
I can't paste anything through my browser.
can you upload your /var/log/XFree86.0.log to a web site?
hang on I'll paste it from another location.
This paste is too big for the remote to handle.  I'll have to paste them in a few lines at a time.  Will take a while.
Did you get a chance to look at my /var/log output?
